examples.example: 我喜欢在疲惫的时候吃一块黑巧克力，让自己充满能量，心情也更加愉悦。

translate.english: I like to eat a piece of dark chocolate when I'm tired to make myself full of energy and feel even more joyful.

examples.example: 我经常给朋友们分享美味的黑巧克力，一起享受甜蜜的快乐时光。

translate.english: I often share delicious dark chocolate with friends and enjoy the sweet and happy time together.

examples.example: 我会在难过的时候吃一点黑巧克力，甜甜的味道能让我瞬间开心起来。

translate.english: I will eat a little dark chocolate when I am sad, and the sweet taste can make me happy instantly.
